members.joinCircumstances: Became captain after Fisher Tiger's death

members.leaveCircumstances: Left to form the Arlong Pirates after ideological split with Jinbe over becoming a Shichibukai
Left to form the Macro Pirates when the crew split

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Accepts Shichibukai Position
keyMoments.description: Jinbe becomes a Shichibukai, pardoning all Sun Pirates members including Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Creates ideological conflict within the crew leading to its dissolution.

keyMoments.title: The Sun Pirates Split
keyMoments.description: The Sun Pirates split into three factions: Jinbe's Sun Pirates, Arlong Pirates, and Macro Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: End of Fisher Tiger's dream of a united fish-man crew.

members.joinCircumstances: Founded the crew after leaving the Sun Pirates due to ideological differences with Jinbe

keyMoments.title: Arlong Pirates Founded
keyMoments.description: Arlong announces his intention to form the Arlong Pirates and leave the Sun Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Formation of the crew that will later terrorize the East Blue and Nami's village.

keyMoments.title: Splits from Sun Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Arlong Pirates officially separate from the Sun Pirates as one of three splinter factions.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Arlong's independent path of vengeance.

members.joinCircumstances: Founded the crew when the Sun Pirates split into three factions

keyMoments.title: Macro Pirates Founded
keyMoments.description: Macro forms his own crew as the Sun Pirates split into three factions.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a neutral path, neither choosing Jinbe's diplomacy nor Arlong's vengeance.
